long_description: Made with top-notch 800-fill goose down and a special edition ripstop shell, the Patagonia Ultralight down jacket supplies packable, on-demand warmth the moment you zip it on. A slim silhouette maximizes thermal efficiency and suits the Ultralight jacket's ideal uses. Special edition nylon ripstop shell fabric is half the weight and has twice the strength of other Patagonia down shell fabrics. Wear it as a belay parka over light layers at shady autumn crags, or layer it under a shell for unmatched warmth; also great for minimalist summer alpine bivies. Durable Water Repellent finish causes water to bead up and roll off, fending off light rain showers and snow. 800-fill-power premium European goose down yields tremendous warmth with low weight and low bulk. Sewn-through construction, a tight channel pattern and just the right amount of down increase versatility for use in more moderate temperatures and diverse activities. Drawcord hem seals in warm air and keeps out cold and spindrift. Includes 2 handwarmer zip pockets and 1 chest zip pocket. The Patagonia Ultralight Down jacket comes with a stuff sack.
short_description: Made with top-notch 800-fill goose down and a special edition ripstop shell, the Patagonia Ultralight down jacket supplies packable, on-demand warmth the moment you zip it on.
